TopicTitle: isa mapsat and mapgen fro mac users?

Articles.Content:
Firstly apologies for anyone telling me to search harder, I've trawled through posts for 40 mins and downloaded 4 or 5 different versions of this mod, but I can't establish if there's a version that actually works for mac owners yet?

Everything installed so far gives me only the gps box and sat dish to attach to a probe but no buttons to mapping tools or any sexy displays

Installation for Macs is the same for Windows. However, you will need to do it manually, not by unzipping the .zip in the KSP main folder. What is your install? It is likely that they aren't installed correctly. Pics?
I unziped it and placed the appropriate files in the corresponding folders. I have the same issue. Could it be the programming language used by ISA?

This is the version you want. Copy the "Innsewerants Space Agency" folder to KSP_osx/GameData/ whole. It should work.

NB: MapGen is a Win-only app.
